column1: there is no valid order made by the Right to Information Commission.

“12. (1) The Commission shall consist of five persons appointed by

the  President  upon 
the 
recommendation  of 
the  Constitutional
Council.  In  making  such  recommendations,  the  Constitutional  Council

shall
